info.title: Quadrax (Wii)
info.author: Slappy
info.details:
Quadrax is logical game game where more than keen reactions you will need fast fingers and you will have to use all your grey brain cells. :-)
Just only that way you can succeed in solving all the 90 (ninety!) levels, which the game has.
Author 

MULTIPLAYER VERSION!

Version 0.5
+ Multiplayer game added!!!
+ Characters are now controlled by Nunchuk joystick
+ Camera is controlled by D-pad
* Better loading times
+ Engine log is created (file Quadrax.log)


Version 0.4
+ Added sound effect for screenshots-taking
* Max. unlocked level saving corrected (#bug fixed)
+ New screen after level completing
* Victory screen camera position corrected

Version 0.3
* Less memory usage
+ Screenshots-taking is now possible (Nunchuk C button)
+ Added level number in HUD
- Max. unlocked level is sometimes not saving correctly (send me an email if this occurs)
+ Camera movement added (Nunchuk joystick)

Version 0.2
* Few graphic improvements.
+ Minimap added
+ Game music is playing in background
+ Performance up!

Version 0.1
This is first public version, so if You find any bug report it! Thanks...
Levels 00, 01 and 02 are unlocked!


Controls
Wiimote D-pad (up, down, left, right) = movement
Button 1 = Red character
Button 2 = Blue character
Button A = action
Button B = Main Menu
Button Home = Back/Cancel or In-Game Menu
Button +/- = Level Up/Down
